metadata.title: CVE-2021-21436 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Agents are able to see and link Config Items without permissions, which are defined in General Catalog. This issue affects: OTRS AG OTRSCIsInCustomerFrontend 7.0.x version 7.0.14 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
